div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1595 Palestine, before 1945 Burial: c. 140 B.C. (M) Contents: 2+ AR Alexander I Bala: 1 tetradr. (Tyre, yr. 163) Antiochus VI: 1 tetradr. (Ace, yr. 169) Disposition: Jerusalem (Hebrew Univ.) 2 Ben-Dor, Kedem 2 (Jerusalem, 1945) Brett, ANSMN 1 (1945), pp. 27-8, no. 21
